titleStmt.title: Description of University of Pennsylvania Ms. Coll. 390 Item 1577: Prāyaścittaviveka

availability.licence: These images and the content of Kislak Center for Special Collections, Rare Books and Manuscripts Ms. Coll. 390 Item 1577: Prāyaścittaviveka are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. notesStmt.note: 174 leaves foliated 1-174, upper left and lower right verso.
Mistakes covered over in yellow or blacked out; some corrections and additions in margins; significant syllables, words, or phrases highlighted in red.
One wooden cover with a simple beveled edge supports the manuscript.

msIdentifier.repository: Kislak Center for Special Collections, Rare Books and Manuscripts

msContents.summary: Manuscript is a treatise employed for consultation, reflection, and discussion and is an explanation, illumination, and commentary regarding the secrets of expiation and atonement (prāyaścitta) and the proper rites and rituals, such as fire sacrifice, to achieve these goals (such as the removal of sin or pāpa).

msItem.title: Prāyaścittaviveka
प्रायश्चित्तविवेक
msItem.colophon: Colophon: iti śrīsāddhadripālamahāmaopādhyāya śrīśūlapāṇiviracitaḥ prāyaścittavivekaḥ saṃpūrṇaḥ // (f. 174r-174v).
